message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase my product. I believe it's incredibly valuable, and I'm setting the initial price at $15,000.
Alice, $15,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm really interested in your product, but I'm only willing to pay $8,000 at this time.  Let's see if we can find some common ground.
Bob, I appreciate your interest. However, $8,000 is significantly below its true value. I'm willing to come down to $13,000. This is my final offer.

Alice, I understand your product has value, but $13,000 is still more than I'm comfortable with.  I'm willing to go up to $10,500. This is my final offer. If we can't agree on this price, I'll have to go with John.
